item.description:
TC: Hal treasurer@mosaicmass.org
EVENT: The tag line on their website says ?Get lost in the fun? and that?s pretty close to the truth! Join us as we navigate a life-size maze cut into a cornfield. Sound intriguing? Like doing paper mazes? It?s a ?LOST VEGAS? theme, without the gambling! For more information and photos, go to http://www.davisfarml...
There is also a working farm with Apple picking and things to eat.
RSVP: Required.
MEET: 10:00 AM. The farm is located in Sterling, Ma. We will try to car pool from a central location in the Metrowest area. Location supplied to RSVPs. You may also meet us there, but you must RSVP so we know to meet you there.
COST: $14.95 +money for lunch, snacks.. and ice cream, of course. $5 nonmember fee.

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: AN A-MAIZE-ING MAZE AT DAVIS' MEGAMAZE (apple picking too)
